channel.title: Comments on: cult of the week – Crawling Chaos

item.title: By: jackthrob
item.dc:creator: jackthrob
item.description: More details on "The Gas Chair" and other releases can be found at https://www.crawlingchaos.co.uk/ ...Enough to satisfy the curious and clarify the Factory warblings. This has been set up by an original member of the band, so he should know. And it's not Uncle Harry's Last Freakout, yet.
item.content:encoded: More details on “The Gas Chair” and other releases can be found at https://www.crawlingchaos.co.uk/ …Enough to satisfy the curious and clarify the Factory warblings. This has been set up by an original member of the band, so he should know. And it’s not Uncle Harry’s Last Freakout, yet.
